message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $9,500. This is a high-quality item that I believe would greatly benefit you, given its value to you is estimated at $8,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.

Hello Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate the quality of your product, however,  $9,500 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $7,000? I believe it's a fair price that reflects the value I place on it.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. In light of this, I would like to propose a price of $8,500 for the product. This is a price that still allows me to maintain a reasonable profit while reflecting the value you see in it.
Thanks for the counteroffer Alice, you're getting closer.  To be honest, $8,000 is the highest I can go. Let me know if that works for you.
